Headline: #3 King Drive Temporary Southbound Reroute near King Drive/63rd
ShortDescription: SB 3 King Drive buses are rerouted via King Drive, 61st, Prairie, 63rd, then resume their normal route on King Drive due to police activity near King Drive/63rd

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
How does this affect my trip?

Southbound #3 King Drive buses are temporarily rerouted via King Drive, 61st, Prairie, 63rd, then resume their normal route on King Drive due to police activity near King Drive/63rd.

Northbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #78 Montrose Temporary Reroute at Montrose/Marine Dr.
ShortDescription: Due to extremely heavy traffic and crowding at the beach, 78 Montrose buses will only provide service up to Montrose/Marine Dr.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Due to extremely heavy traffic and crowding at the beach, #78 Montrose buses will only provide service up to Montrose/Marine Dr.

 

Please allow extra travel time

Headline: Pink Line Service Running with Delays
ShortDescription: Pink Line trains are running with delays due to to a shortage of available staff; we're working to run as much service as possible. Allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Pink Line trains are running with delays due to a temporary shortage of available staff.

At this time, our operations staff are working to run as much service as frequently and manage service to be spaced as evenly as possible.

Consider other service alternatives that might serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines.

Allow extra travel time.
